meanings.definition: people who waste time or engage in frivolous activities
meanings.sent1: The fribblers chatted aimlessly by the water cooler.
meanings.sent2: She always gets distracted by fribblers on social media.
meanings.sent3: The office was full of fribblers playing with paper airplanes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a swarm of fribblers, buzzing around without purpose.
meanings.sent5: In the park, fribblers lounged on the grass, enjoying the sunny day.

meanings.definition: to waste time or engage in frivolous activities
meanings.sent1: Don't fribble away your time on meaningless tasks.
meanings.sent2: He tends to fribble when he should be working on important projects.
meanings.sent3: She decided to fribble the afternoon away by watching cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Time fribbles by when you're having fun with friends.
meanings.sent5: The students fribbled instead of studying for their exams.

meanings.definition: characterized by wasting time or engaging in frivolous activities
meanings.sent1: His fribblers behavior led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The party had a fribblers atmosphere, with no serious discussions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fribblers antics entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The town was known for its fribblers attitude towards work.
meanings.sent5: The fribblers mindset often resulted in unfinished projects.
